prompt: Design a playful onboarding screen with a bright yellow background (Colors.yellow[200]). Feature a rounded square illustration at the top (using a Container with 20px border radius) occupying 30% of the screen height, filled with a soft orange (Colors.orange[100]). Place a black icon (Icons.favorite, size 100) in the center. Below, add a bold heading in black (font size 26px, FontWeight.w900) with the text 'Let’s Have Fun!'. Include a subtitle in dark gray (Colors.grey[800], font size 16px) describing the app’s engaging features. At the bottom, include an orange 'Join Now' button (Colors.orange, 12px radius) and a 'Skip' text button in gray. Use 24px padding, center-align text, and add 16px spacing for a cheerful, inviting look.
